Title: January 2022
Content: *p70959a0624*6  2 a student investigated lenzs law using the apparatus shown.magnetxcopper tubethe student dropped the magnet into the copper tube and measured the time t for the magnet to reach the bottom of the tube.(a) the student had a large number of copper tubes of different lengths x.  he predicted that the magnet would fall with constant acceleration a inside the copper tubes.devise a plan, using a graphical method, to test this prediction.(6)
